articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Accuses U.S. of Its Human Rights Abuses
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Accuses U.S. of Its Human Rights Abuses
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry issued the following statement on Friday as regards the fact that the human rights abuses systematically committed by the U.S. were revealed again:
					 On December 9, the U.S. Congress made public some parts of the report that exposed inhuman acts of torture applied by the CIA against suspects of international terrorist groups.
					
					 Those inhumane, medieval tortures have been committed systematically, premeditatedly and extensively under the approval and protection of the U.S. president. This makes it obvious that the U.S. is the kingpin of human rights violation and tundra of human rights.
					
					 The revealed acts of torture by the CIA this time are nothing new nor is it in all. They are a piece of the innumerous crimes against humanity the U.S., a sample state of human rights violation, has committed all over the world in the past.
					
					 The whole world is shocked at such atrocious tortures, and international human rights organizations and groups and all the countries are unanimously condemning them.
					
					 The kingpin of such human rights violation is pointing its finger at other countries over their human rights records, and this is the height of hypocrisy.
					
					 If the UNSC is truly interested in the settlement of human rights issue, it should not discuss the fictitious "human rights issue" of the DPRK framed up by a few human scum but, from the viewpoint of setting an example, put into question the century-old heinous human rights violations self-revealed in the U.S., a permanent member of the UNSC, and bring before the court those who are responsible for such acts.
					
					 The world will judge the impartiality of the UNSC through its attitude towards the DPRK's just stand on the protection and promotion of human rights and towards the serious human rights records in the U.S.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Slams Israel's Military Attack on Syria
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Slams Israel's Military Attack on Syria
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry on Dec. 12 gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA as regards the fact that Israel recently made air raids on Syria:
					 On Dec. 7 Israel illegally conducted air raids on the airport in Damascus and its vicinity.
					
					 Such gangster-like military attack is a wanton violation of Syria's sovereignty and international laws.
					
					 The U.S. is behind the escalated tension and instability in the Middle East. It has zealously encouraged and patronized Israel's armed attacks and military threats to its neighboring countries while resorting to all means and methods to topple the Syrian people's legitimate government.
					
					 The DPRK strongly condemns the recent air raids and all other aggressions and interventions that make the situation complicated.
					
					 It extends full support and solidarity to the Syrian people in the just struggle to reject the outside pressure and interference and protect the sovereignty and security of their country.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry on Feats Performed by Kim Jong Il for Country's Reunification
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry on Feats Performed by Kim Jong Il for Country's Reunification
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The Disarmament and Peace Institute of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK Friday issued a report on the study of the distinguished contribution leader Kim Jong Il made by advancing the three charters for national reunification as a reunification programme common to the nation on the occasion of the third anniversary of his demise.
					 The report said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's formulation of the three charters for national reunification is the immortal ideological and theoretical feat performed in the struggle for the country's reunification to be specially recorded in the Korean nation's history of the movement for national reunification.
					
					 The fundamental principle clarified by the three charters is the principle of independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity. 
					
					 The three charters for national reunification is the programme for reunification common to the nation truth and realistic nature of which have been proved through the movement for national reunification. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated and systematized ideologically and theoretically the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for national reunification and, on this basis, wisely led the Korean people in their efforts for implementing the three charters for national reunification with rare ability to implement them. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il, through his untiring patriotic devotion, brought about such epochal events as two north-south summits for the first time in the history of national division and published internally and externally the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it. 
					
					 The publication of the historic north-south joint declaration brought about such exciting events as brisk dialogue and contacts between the north and the south, relinking of once severed railways and roads, repatriation of unconverted long-term prisoners to the DPRK, reunion of separated families and relatives from the north and the south, the establishment of the Kaesong Industrial Zone symbolic of the north-south economic cooperation. They clearly proved the vitality of the three charters for national reunification which has been cherished by all Koreans as their common charter for reunification.
					
					 The "unification" touted by the Park Geun Hye regime of south Korea is the "unification through absorption", a replica of German-style unification and, in essence, a theory of confrontation against peace and unification.
					
					 The present regime of south Korea is crying out for making a "charter for unification". This is because the principle of independence and the proposal for achieving reunification by federal formula, the core of the charter for reunification common to all Koreans, do not meet its ulterior purpose.
					
					 If the south Korean regime has even an iota of the will to atone for its crimes before the nation and history, it should, before anything else, bring life to the spirit of By Our Nation Itself and retake sovereignty over the issue of inter-Korean relations and reunification issue.
					
					 It should respect the three charters for national reunification confirmed as a programme for reunification common to the nation through the inter-Korean agreement and respond to the nationwide discussion on their implementation.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Blasts S. Korean Regime's Dream of "Unification under Liberal Democracy"
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Blasts S. Korean Regime's Dream of "Unification under Liberal Democracy"
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) in information bulletin No. 1081 Friday slammed the south Korean puppet forces for getting zealous in escalating confrontation of the social systems under the signboard of "getting ready for unification".
					 The bulletin said:
					
					 At a recent strings of meetings such as the third meeting of the "Committee for Preparations for Unification", a policy meeting and seminar, the puppet forces cried out for working out a draft "charter for unification", pushing forward the construction of "world peace park" in the Demilitarized Zone, reenergizing public diplomacy for unification and setting forth a proposal for financial integration between the south and the north.
					
					 The puppet group is also letting loose a whole string of bullshits that unification is a "magic remedy for settling the issue on the Korean Peninsula," "blessing by nations in the Northeast Asian region" and "great opportunity for humanity."
					
					 Even the south Korean chief executive has joined in its trumpeting. Openly calling for "German-style unification," she jabbered that huge burden will be shouldered by the south unless preparations are made for unification, "issue of human rights in the north" should be solved for the future of "unified Korea" and that if persistent efforts are made for the change of the north, a new chapter will be opened for the era of unification.
					
					 She even talked about unified currency and "constitution for unification."
					
					 Branding this as a serious provocation against the DPRK and a wanton challenge to the desire of the nation for peaceful reunification, the bulletin continued:
					
					 The Korean peninsula is not Germany and the unification desired by the Korean nation is not "German-style unification" in which one side is swallowed up by the other. What the nation wants is the reunification whereby Koreans get reconciled and promote co-existence and co-prosperity.
					
					 "Unification of the social systems" pursued by the puppet forces will only cause mistrust, confrontation and war between fellow countrymen.
					
					 Such unification will only bring huge misfortune and disaster. 
					
					 "Unification under liberal democracy" is a daydream that can never come true.

articles.title: Lithuanian President on Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Lithuanian President on Relations with DPRK
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Kang Yong Dok, DPRK ambassador to Lithuania, presented his credentials to Dalia Grybauskaite, president of Lithuania, on Dec. 8.
					 The president hoped that the bilateral relations would develop on good terms.

articles.title: Young Abductees Interviewed
articles.content:
Young Abductees Interviewed
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Nine youngsters were interviewed by domestic and foreign reporters at Koryo Compatriots Hall Friday. They had been abducted by south Korean agents but succeeded in coming back home to lead a happy life in May last year.
					 Present at the press conference were media persons here, reporters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and foreign correspondents.
					
					 Its emcee said that its objective is to clarify the fact that recently the U.S. and south Korean "human rights" tricksters are getting frantic with the anti-DPRK propaganda, spreading false stories that the above-said youngsters were "executed or detained."
					
					 Mun Chol, Pak Kwang Hyok, Jong Kwang Yong, and Ryu Kwang Hyok, students of Hero Hyesan Secondary School No. 1; Paek Yong Won, student of Hamhung University of Education; Jang Kuk Hwa, Ro Jong Yong, Ryu Chol Ryong, and Ri Kwang Hyok, students of Kumsong Secondary School No. 1, introduced themselves at the conference.
					
					 At round table talks held on June 20 last year they opened to the public how they were abducted by south Korean agents.
					
					 They told in detail about the facts that they are given an ample opportunity of learning and leading a happy life with nothing to desire more in the world after coming back to the motherland.
					
					 They said that Marshal Kim Jong Un is their real father, renewing their determination to live up to the profound loving care shown by him for them to prevent them from taking the road of crimes after betraying the country. 
					
					 They loudly sang the song "We Are the Happiest in the World" representing their happy life.
					
					 They were asked questions by foreign correspondents at the press conference.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Zimbabwean President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Zimbabwean President
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- A floral basket was placed before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Friday on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il. It was sent by Robert Gabriel Mugabe, president of the Republic of Zimbabwe and president and first secretary of the Zimbabwe African National Union-Patriotic Front.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were laid before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Friday on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.
					 They were sent by the Women's International Democratic Federation and its President Marcia de Campos Pereira.

articles.title: National Art Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Art Exhibition Opens
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- A national art exhibition opened with due ceremony on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Seen in the center of the venue was an art piece portraying Kim Jong Il standing atop Mt. Paektu.
					
					 On display there are at least 70 art works including paintings showing his revolutionary career and those depicting service personnel and people out in the drive for the building of a thriving nation. 
					
					 Acryl painting "Dawn of our party history", oil painting "April 14, day of great change" and others deal with the great personalities of Kim Jong Il who glorified the party-building history of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Displayed there are oil painting "Instilling courage into guards soldiers" and acryl painting "Regarding Songun politics as all-powerful treasured sword" and other drawings, telling about the feats Kim Jong Il performed for army building.
					
					 Korean painting "Walking despite heavy rain," watercolor painting "With real father's love" and other art pieces make an impressive portrayal of Kim Jong Il who devoted himself to the country and its people. 
					
					 Paintings on display also include Korean painting "Leader, don't part from us please," woodcut "General, you should not go," oil painting "Kim Il Sung Square in December," gem-powdered painting "Day breaks on bank of River Chongchon." 
					
					 An opening ceremony took place at the Korean Art Gallery on Friday. 
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, An Tong Chun, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of the Unions of Art and Literature, officials concerned, artists, working people, youth and students in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Han Chol, vice-minister of Culture, made an opening address.
					
					 After the ceremony the participants looked round the art pieces.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Industrial Establishments
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Industrial Establishments
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- A number of technical successes has been made in the field of local passenger transport and communications of the DPRK.
					 This year, the Pyongyang Trolley Bus Factory has showed an increase of 1.5 times in the production of trolley bus as compared with last year by applying practical innovations to its production processes.
					
					 In this regard, Jong Pu Chan, director of the factory's industrial laboratory, told KCNA:
					
					 This year has witnessed scores of technical innovations applied to the factory, which is conducive to economizing on labor and materials.
					
					 In particular, it has finished the renovation of motor production process and establishment of auto control system for heat-treatment furnace, thus prolonging the serviceable life of bearings and further reducing the vibration noise of running trolley bus.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Pyongyang Fiber-optic Cables Factory has registered a success in producing different sizes of cables by introducing technical achievements in its production, thus making great contribution to the modernization of communications.
					
					 All its products fit with quality index.
					
					 The factory has paid deep attention to upgrading the technical skills of its employees for increased production of high-quality cables.

articles.title: Young People Pledge to Remain True to Leadership of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Young People Pledge to Remain True to Leadership of Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- A meeting of youth and students took place at the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Friday on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. At the meeting they renewed their pledge to remain loyal to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, true to the behests of Kim Jong Il.
					 All participants observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A letter of pledge was read out by Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					
					 The revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il was the one of a prominent leader who created a new history of building a thriving nation and performed great exploits in the history of the Korean nation and the history of world politics by successfully carrying forward the lineage of the Juche revolution, the letter said, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the Korean People's Army and the state into those of President Kim Il Sung and thus provided a firm guarantee for the eternal prosperity of the nation.
					
					 He put forward the young people as successors to the Juche revolution and members of the most dynamic unit for building a thriving nation, made sure that every creation associated with their devoted efforts goes by the name of Chongnyon and left so many stories telling his love for them. 
					
					 All participants in the meeting renewed their pledge to always hold Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche and defend and glorify their revolutionary exploits through generations, in reflection of the faith and will of all the members of the young vanguard throughout the country.
					
					 They stressed that they would become the members of the first-line vanguard and death-defying corps who dedicate their youth and life to defending the WPK with firm will to absolutely trust and follow Kim Jong Un despite any storm and stress.
					
					 They chanted in a loud voice the slogans reflecting their ardent will to vigorously advance toward the final victory of the cause of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK Choe Ryong Hae, officials concerned and those of the youth league and young people and students.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Regime of Escalating Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Regime of Escalating Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces are escalating the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket as their policy of confrontation with the DPRK is going totally bankrupt.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in an article.
					
					 Those with normal way of thinking termed the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket kicked up by the puppet forces an anachronistic act of bedeviling the inter-Korean relations and increasing the tensions on the Korean Peninsula long ago, the article notes and goes on:
					
					 The "human rights issue in the north" much touted by the south Korean authorities is nothing but total bull shit let loose by traitors, renegades and human scum for a petty amount of money after fleeing  the north as criminals.
					
					 They are sadly mistaken if they think they can hurt the dignified DPRK through such propaganda full of malignancy and lies.
					
					 South Korean group of traitors' trumpeting about "human rights issue in the north" sounds no more than rabid dogs' barking.
					
					 The escalated anti-DPRK "human rights" racket can by no means be a way out for them.
					
					 With no rhetoric can they escape total failure in their policy of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to know that their mean and foolish "human rights" racket would only bring them disgrace and destruction.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Snubs Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Resolution"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Snubs Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Resolution"
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The National Defence Commission of the DPRK declared in a statement that it categorically denies and rejects the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" rammed through the UN by the U.S. and its followers and would launch the toughest countermeasure to smash the resolution. 
					 The statement is drawing international support and sympathy. 
					
					 Much upset by this, the U.S. and its followers are busy talking rubbish to justify their criminal action.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentator's article dismisses their outpourings as a poor excuse as they were a revelation of the fear the crafty tricksters and wicked criminals inevitably feel in face of justice and truth.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Their row is aimed at politicizing and internationalizing the non-existing "human rights issue" in the DPRK by abusing the words the "international community" in a bid to hype it and push the situation to an extreme phase.
					
					 Another aim sought by the U.S. and its followers is to bring down the socialist system in the DPRK, undermine the single-minded unity and provide a legal excuse for invasion of the DPRK.
					
					 The above-said racket offers the service personnel and people of the DPRK an opportunity to keenly realize once again that the U.S. is a sworn enemy.
					
					 Now that the U.S. and its followers are working hard to stifle the DPRK at any cost even by abusing the UN, the DPRK will make every possible effort to safeguard the sovereignty, social system and dignity of its supreme leadership. 
					
					 It is a pipedream of the U.S. to try to bring down the social system in the DPRK. This will be proved by DPRK's measures to bolster up its nuclear deterrence. 
					
					 The DPRK's revolutionary armed forces are fully ready to wipe out the criminals with the toughest countermeasures. 
					
					 The world will witness the practical actions through which the DPRK champions truth and makes justice prevail over injustice and emerges victorious.

articles.title: Political Scandal Drives S. Korean Regime into Tight Corner
articles.content:
Political Scandal Drives S. Korean Regime into Tight Corner
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- South Koreans are becoming increasingly critical of the chief executive. 
					 According to the  results of survey conducted by an institution concerned on the support rate for Park Geun Hye on Dec. 5 and 8, it declined to 30 percent, the lowest-ever since her coming into power. 
					
					 Public opinion says that there are growing distrust and criticism of the south Korean regime due to the recently disclosed case of Jong Yun Hoe's interference in state affairs. 
					
					 As already known, the opening to public of a document of Chongwadae brought to light the crime of Jong Yun Hoe who trifled with the administration by exercising the real power behind Park Geun Hye. This is stunning the south Korean society.  
					
					 What matters is the chief executive's attitude shielding this guy.
					
					 Media of south Korea describes the rapid fall of the support rate for Park as due outcome of the people's grievances against the present ruling quarters responsible for all sorts of injustice and corruption.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group's Frantic Racket under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group's Frantic Racket under Fire
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The security investigation group of the puppet Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency forcibly searched the house of Hwang Son, representative of the Forum for the Study of Politics Desired, on Thursday on charge of violation of the "Security Law" (SL).
					 Dozens of puppet policemen broke into the house of Hwang and frantically searched it in a bid to secure evidence proving the violation of the SL.
					
					 The fascists took such action, labeling a lecture given by Hwang at Jogye Temple in Seoul with Sin Un Mi, Korean professor in the U.S., some days ago an act of "following the north".
					
					 On the same day the fascist police simultaneously searched the offices of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration and its Seoul headquarters under the pretext that they sponsored the lecture.
					
					 Such frantic racket of the south Korean puppet group more clearly reveals the true colors of the group as confrontation maniacs.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in China
Beijing, December 11 (KCNA) -- A meeting to remember leader Kim Jong Il took place in Beijing on Dec. 10.
					 Displayed at the venue of the meeting were photos showing his revolutionary career and feats.
					
					 The participants placed a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before paying tribute to them.
					
					 Zhang Jinlu, daughter of Zhang Wei-hua who is a Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, said that Kim Jong Il performed feats by devoting his all to the prosperity of the DPRK and the happiness of the Korean people.
					
					 The prosperity of the DPRK would be unthinkable apart from his feats, she noted.
					
					 The son of Mr. Shang Yue, a Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, looked back on the loving care shown by Kim Jong Il for his family.
					
					 Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong, a Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, said:
					
					 I was surprised and bitterly grieved to hear the sad news of the demise of Kim Jong Il three years ago.
					
					 At the memorial service held in Pyongyang, I felt the determination and will of the Korean people to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem forever and build a thriving nation true to his behests, rallied close around Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The son of Li Zade, an anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter in China; Chai Long, a great-grandson of Chai Shiying who is a Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle; Liu Xiaohua, daughter of Liu Hanxing who is also a Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, said that they were struck with admiration at the successes being achieved in the DPRK.
					
					 The son of Feng Zhongyun, a Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, praised Kim Jong Il for developing in depth the Juche idea fathered by the President and further strengthening and developing the Workers' Party of Korea, the DPRK and its army.
					
					 It was attended by the bereaved families of anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters in China, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyrs and Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and DPRK ambassador to China and staff members of the embassy.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered by Bulgarian Political Personage
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered by Bulgarian Political Personage
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, released a statement on Dec. 5 on the occasion of the third anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise.
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a great leader who devoted his entire life to strengthening and developing the Workers' Party of Korea, to ensuring happiness of the Korean people and to ensuring the victorious advance of the cause of global independence.
					
					 He trained the Korean People's Army into an invincible strong army, reliably defended socialist Korea from the imperialist allied forces' vicious move to stifle it, and turned it into an impregnable socialist fortress that has achieved the single-minded unity under the unfurled banner of Songun.
					
					 Defense of socialism is one of the great feats he performed for the Korean people and all other world progressives.
					
					 Although he passed away, he is always remembered by mankind.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered by Brazilian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered by Brazilian Figure
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The traits of leader Kim Jong Il are characterized by his love for the people.
					 Acilino Riveiro, national coordinator of the Genuine Democratic Movement of Brazil, said this in a statement issued on Dec. 5 to honor the memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il considered it as the aim of the revolution to bring into bloom the love for the people.
					
					 As he loved the people so much, he pursued benevolent politics without an equal in the world.
					
					 One can know through his ceaseless forced march for the field guidance how much he loved his people.
					
					 It was Kim Jong Il who made long and difficult journeys for happiness of the people.
					
					 He, who boundlessly loved the people and always shared joy and sorrow with them, passed away in a train coach due to the excessive mental and physical stress caused by his ceaseless high-intensity forced march for the building of a thriving nation and the improvement of the standard of people's living.
					
					 The Korean people will hold him in high esteem forever and carry his idea and cause through to the end under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Korean Musician in U.S.
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Korean Musician in U.S.
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- An article written by Korean musician in the U.S. Ri Jun Mu, head of the Uruk Symphony Orchestra, was posted on Minjok Thongsin, internet newspaper of Koreans in the U.S., on Dec. 5 with the approach of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 The article said that working masses in the north who were faithful to Chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) Kim Jong Il recollect with honor the worthwhile years when they were led by him, singing such songs as "Good Health of Dear Leader Represents Our Happiness," "Best Wishes" and "We Believe in You as in Heaven."
					
					 Kim Jong Il's proposition that music means his first love is the aphorism suggestive of his music-based politics famous in the world, the article said, and went on:
					
					 Whenever I listen to the famous masterpieces created by him I used to believe that he has the gem-like pure mind. Kim Jong Il was the experienced statesman, great thinker and well-known artiste. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the great statesman who pursued music-based politics, the first of its kind in human history. He was the only man who organically integrated songs and politics. 
					
					 He stressed the important role played by music, saying that the victory of the revolution is always in store for the people advancing with songs. 
					
					 The revolutionary struggle means grand symphony of history and the base producing songs and a revolution is always sure to triumph in the place where loud songs resound forth. This is the profound truth taught by the song-based philosophy of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The political mode which emanated from the song-based philosophy is the mysterious music-based politics.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Foreign Personages
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Events took place in foreign countries on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included an opening ceremony of the week of the DPRK photo and book exhibition in Indonesia and film shows in Equatorial Guinea, Nigeria and Romania from Dec. 2 to 4.
					
					 On display at the venue of the photo and book exhibition were photos documenting the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il and Songun leadership exploits of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Participants in the film shows watched the Korean films including "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation" and "Arms of Korea".
					
					 The curator of the Folklore Museum of Indonesia lauded Kim Jong Il as the great man who made contributions to accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 Personages including the general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea said that the exploits Kim Jong Il performed by turning the DPRK into a powerful country in which the people's desire came true would always be remembered not only by the Korean people but also by the people of Equatorial Guinea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Various Countries
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Memorial events took place in various countries on Dec. 3 and 5 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included a remembrance meeting and DPRK photo exhibition held by the Nakhodka City Committee of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, a seminar, remembrance meeting and film show by the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism－Kimjongilism and a remembrance meeting, photo exhibition and film show by the Pakistan－Korea Friendship Association.
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Participants in the film shows watched the Korean films including "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation".
					
					 Zelenov, first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, said that Kim Jong Il was the great man who dedicated his whole life to the cause of the country and its people's happiness.
					
					 Lyudmil Kostadinov, chief of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism－Kimjongilism, and other reporters and speakers highly lauded Kim Jong Il as the peerless elder statesman.
					
					 They expressed belief that the army and people of Korea would demonstrate only the victory and honor in their struggle for building a thriving nation and achieving the country's independent and peaceful reunification under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Zabed Ansari, secretary general of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan－Korea Friendship Association, and other speakers stressed that Kim Jong Il's revolutionary exploits performed on behalf of the Korean people and progressive humankind would last forever along with his august name.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Pakistan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Mexico
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Cuautemoc Amezcua Dromundo, chairman of the Central Committee of the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, issued a statement on Dec. 2 to  honor the memory of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il dedicated himself to the building of a thriving socialist nation, the cause of the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea and the cause of global independence.
					
					 He passed away on a running train because of the pent-up mental and physical stress while making high-intensity forced march for field guidance.
					
					 Since his demise, Marshal Kim Jong Un has stood at the helm of the Korean revolution.
					
					 I am sure that the party, army and people of the DPRK will certainly translate into reality the lifetime desire of Kim Jong Il, united close around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their just struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and winning a victory in the cause of the country's independent and peaceful reunification and the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Great Exploits Lauded by Thai Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Great Exploits Lauded by Thai Organizations
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand and the Thailand－DPRK Friendship Association issued a joint statement on Dec. 8 to honor the memory of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The statement said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il who dedicated himself to improving the people's living standard while regarding it as his lifetime motto to believe in people as in Heaven made journeys to mix with people till the last moments of his life.
					
					 History records a lot of leaders who claimed worked for people but it does not know such great man as HE Kim Jong Il who passed away on his way for field guidance for the people's happiness.
					
					 The past three years were a period featured by the Korean people's boundless yearning for HE Kim Jong Il and their invariable loyalty and noble sense of moral obligation towards him.
					
					 The Korean people have brought about great changes by pushing forward their dynamic advance for carrying out his behests.
					
					 HE Kim Jong Un saw to it that the DPRK held HE Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 Though HE Kim Jong Il passed away, the great exploits he performed on behalf of the Korean people and progressive humankind will last forever.
					
					 He will always be with us.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed by Swiss Organizations
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Committee for Honoring the Memory of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Dec. 4 on the occasion of the third anniversary of his demise.
					 The statement said that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were the Heaven-sent great men, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il dealt sledge-hammer blows at the imperialists and reactionaries who floated the "theory on the collapse of north Korea" after the President's demise and led the Korean-style socialist cause started by him to victory.
					
					 He increased the might of the single-minded unity of the DPRK's society in every way while regarding believing in people as in Heaven as his maxim.
					
					 He was, indeed, a great thinker and theoretician, statesman, military strategist, iron-willed brilliant commander and tender-hearted father of the people.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un formulated Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the guiding idea of the Workers' Party of Korea and is reliably carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We will also hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem forever.
					
					 The peerless great man will always be alive in our hearts.

articles.title: Instituto de Desarme y Paz de MINREX recuerda hazanas de Kim Jong Il en reunificacion de Corea
articles.content:
Instituto de Desarme y Paz de MINREX recuerda hazanas de Kim Jong Il en reunificacion de Corea
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 3o aniversario del deceso del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el Instituto de Desarme y Paz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publico el dia 12 un informe de estudio sobre especiales meritos del Dirigente quien presento las Tres Cartas para la Reunificacion de la Patria como gran programa de reunificacion de la nacion comun.
					La formulacion de las Tres Cartas para la Reunificacion de la Patria por el Dirigente constituye una indeleble hazana ideo-teorica  de la reunificacion de la patria a ser registrada como letra dorada en la historia de la nacion coreana para la reintegracion territorial, el informe subraya y continua:
					
					Los principios fundamentales iluminados por las Cartas en cuestion son la independencia, la reunificacion pacifica y la gran unidad nacional.
					
					Las Tres Cartas para la Reunificacion de la Patria devienen programa comun de la nacion, cuya veracidad y caracter realista fueron comprobados en el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					El Dirigente formulo y sistematizo en lo ideo-teorico las proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung por la reunificacion de la patria y dirigio sabiamente la lucha del pueblo coreano por poner en practica las mencionadas cartas.
					
					Gracias a sus abnegados esfuerzos patrioticos, se ha celebrado dos veces la cumbre Norte-Sur por primera vez en la historia de division nacional y quedaron publicadas ante todos los coreanos y el mundo la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, programa de implementacion de la primera.
					
					Despues de publicados esos documentos intercoreanos, se activaron los dialogos y contactos N-S, se conectaron los ferrocarriles y carreteras cortados, se devolvieron los ex presos de largas condenas no abjurados, se realizaron los encuentros entre los familiares y parientes separados en el Norte y el Sur y se fundo la zona industrial de Kaesong, simbolo de cooperacion economica N-S. 
					
					Estos acontecimientos emocionantes demostraron la vitalidad de aquellas 3 cartas.
					
					La "unificacion", de que habla tanto el "poder" de Park Geun-hye, es la "de absorcion" al estilo aleman y una teoria conflictiva que reviste el caracter antipaz y anti-reunificacion.
					
					Las actuales autoridades surcoreanas intentan instituir aparte la "Carta de Unificacion" porque no les gustan los principios de independencia y el proyecto de reunificacion mediante la formula federal que son puntos claves de las arriba referidas Cartas comunes de la nacion.
					
					Si ellas tienen la minima intencion de expiar ante la nacion y la historia, deben revitalizar el espiritu del ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" y recuperar la soberania en los problemas de relaciones intercoreanas y reunificacion.
					
					Deben respetar las Tres Cartas para la Reunificacion de la Patria, confirmadas ya como gran programa comun de la nacion mediante los acuerdos intercoreanos, y aceptar la discusion pannacional sobre los remedios de su materializacion.

articles.title: "Unificacion mediante fusion de regimenes" es vana ilusion, insiste CRPP
articles.content:
"Unificacion mediante fusion de regimenes" es vana ilusion, insiste CRPP
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que los titeres surcoreanos intensifican la campana conflictiva con el regimen de la parte connacional bajo el rotulo de "Preparativos de unificacion", el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 12 la informacion no. 1081. 
					Recientemente, los titeres surcoreanos celebraron la tercera reunion del "comite preparatorio de unificacion", la reunion de la politica y el seminario, etc. en que se discutieron varios problemas como el de elaborar el proyecto de la "carta de unificacion", el de impulsar la construccion del "parque mundial de paz" en la Zona Desmilitarizada, el de activar la diplomacia publica por la unificacion y el de presentar el proyecto de integracion financiera Sur-Norte, comienza la nota y prosigue:
					
					Al mismo tiempo, chismean que la unificacion es "medicina magica para la solucion del problema de la Peninsula Coreana", "bendicion de los paises regionales del Nordeste Asiatico" y "cajon de tesoros para la humanidad del mundo". 
					
					Hasta la mandataria surcoreana preconiza la "unificacion al estilo aleman" diciendo que "si no nos preparamos desde ahora para la unificacion, asumiremos enormes cargas despues de unificacion".
					
					Prosigue que "hay que mejorar sin falta la situacion de derechos humanos del Norte de Corea para el futuro de ´Corea unificada´" y "se abrira la nueva pagina de la epoca de unificacion si nos esforzamos constantemente por cambiar al Norte de Corea". 
					
					Y habla hasta de la institucion de la moneda unica y de la "Constitucion de unificacion". 
					
					Esos dichos, que persiguen el enfrentamiento entre los regimenes de ambas partes coreanas, constituyen grave provocacion y desafio a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y a la aspiracion nacional a la reunificacion pacifica. 
					
					La Peninsula Coreana no es Alemania. Lo que desea tanto la nacion coreana no es la "reunificacion al estilo aleman" mediante la toma de una parte por la otra sino la basada en reconciliacion, coexistencia y coprosperidad nacionales. 
					
					La "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes", que persiguen los titeres surcoreanos, causara solo la desconfianza, el antagonismo y la guerra entre los connacionales. 
					
					Por lo tanto, producira desgracias y desastres lejos de ser la "medicina magica" o la "bendicion" y "cajon de tesoros".
					
					La "unificacion bajo el sistema democratico y liberal" es una ilusion nunca realizable.

articles.title: Jovenes raptados por titeres surcoreanos ofrecen rueda de prensa
articles.content:
Jovenes raptados por titeres surcoreanos ofrecen rueda de prensa
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- 9 jovenes y ninos escolares, quienes, raptados por la banda titere del Sur de Corea regresaron en mayo del ano pasado a la patria y disfrutan de vida feliz, se entrevistaron el dia 12 en la Casa de Compatriotas Coryo con los periodistas del interior y exterior del pais.
					A la entrevista asistieron los periodistas de la rama de prensa e informacion y la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon) y los corresponsales extranjeros.
					
					El presidente de la entrevista dijo que organizo esa entrevista en relacion con que en estos dias, los intrigantes de "DDHH" de Estados Unidos y el Sur de Corea recrudecen la absurda campana anti-RPDC soltando que esos jovenes y ninos escolares fueron "condenados" y "encarcelados".
					
					Ante todo, presentaron a si mismos los alumnos de la Escuela Secundaria Heroina No.1 de Hyesan, Mun Chol, Ryu Kwang Hyok, Pak Kwang Hyok y Jong Kwang Yong y el estudiante del Instituto Superior Pedagogico de Hamhung, Paek Yong Won y los alumnos de la Escuela Secundaria No.1 Kumsong, Ri Kwang Hyok, Ryu Chol Ryong, Jang Kuk Hwa y Ro Jong Yong.
					
					Ellos ya publicaron a todo el mundo en la mesa redonda sostenida el 20 de junio de 2013, el proceso del secuestro de si mismos por las maniobras intrigantes de la banda de los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Ellos dieron a conocer los hechos de que estudian a sus anchas y crecen sin envidiar nada, luego de regresar a la patria.
					
					Ellos dijeron que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un es su padre afectuoso y decidieron responder sin falta a la gran benevolencia del Mariscal quien hizo regresar a la patria a si mismos que traicionaron al pais.
					
					Cantaron la cancion "No tenemos que envidiar nada a nadie" que refleja sus vidas felices.
					
					Seguidamente, hubo la pregunta de la  corresponsal extranjera.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun advierte al Sur de Corea por campana de DDHH anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun advierte al Sur de Corea por campana de DDHH anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun divulgo el dia 12 un articulo individual revelando que los titeres surcoreanos dan mas acicate a la campana intrigante de "derechos humanos" anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea porque su politica de confrontacion anti-RPDC esta a punto de fracaso total.
					Las personas con sano juicio ya calificaron la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de accion anacronica que agrava las relaciones intercoreanas y la tension de la Peninsula Coreana, senala el rotativo y prosigue:
					
					El problema de DDHH del Norte (de Corea) cuestionado por las autoridades surcoreanas no pasa de ser una chismografia pronunciada por los traidores y los delincuentes, que huyeron de la RPDC profugos de la justicia, para ganar miserables sumas de dinero.
					
					Seran muy equivocados si ellos piensan que podrian difamar a la digna RPDC con tales embustes manipulados con mala intencion.
					
					La RPDC considera esa campana como ladrido de perros rabiosos.
					
					Para las autoridades surcoreanas, no puede ser nunca la salvacion el recrudecimiento de la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC.
					
					Ellas no pueden impedir por nada el fracaso total de su politica de enfrentamiento anti-RPDC.
					
					Con ese sucio complot, se ganaran solo la verguenza y el arruinamiento.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela verdadero aspecto de invencion de "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela verdadero aspecto de invencion de "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Suscita el apoyo y la simpatia internacionales la declaracion del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, que tras rechazar totalmente la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC, aprobada por Estados Unidos y sus fuerzas seguidoras instigando a la ONU, declaro tomar las contramedidas super-intransigentes para frustrarla.
					Muy perplejos, EE.UU. y sus lacayos sueltan ahora las sofisterias para justificar sus crimenes.
					
					Estas tonterias no pasan de ser un pretexto miserable siendo una expresion del temor inevitable de los conspiradores astutos y los delincuentes que temen ante la justicia y la verdad.
					
					Asi subraya el dia 12 el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo de comentarista y continua:
					
					Ellos amplian escalonadamente el inexistente "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC al politizarlo y internacionalizarlo a fin de derrocar el regimen socialista de esta, descomponer su unidad monolitica y preparar el pretexto legal necesario a la invasion armada contra ella.
					
					A traves del presente caso, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea se sintieron una vez mas que EE.UU. es su enemigo jurado.
					
					Puesto que EE.UU. y sus fuerzas seguidoras se desesperan por aplastar la RPDC instigando a la ONU, la RPDC hara todos los esfuerzos para salvaguardar su soberania, regimen y maxima dignidad.
					
					Es irrealizable la ambicion de EE.UU. de destruir el regimen de la RPDC. 
					
					Las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de Corea estan totalmente listas para aniquilar a los criminales con las contramedidas super-intransigentes nunca vistas.
					
					Demostraremos con las acciones reales como se defiende la verdad y como vence la justicia a la injusticia.
